snippet: Testifying in a Manhattan court, Marko Markovich talked about the night that he and two others sneaked into 1 World Trade Center, climbed to the skyline’s highest point and took flight.
abstract: Marko Markovich, BASE jumper who parachuted from top of 1 world Trade Center along with James Brady and Andrew Rossig, testifies at trial where three are charged with violating New York City ordinance against BASE jumping and felony burglary; defense lawyers argue danger to people on ground was minimal due to men's high level of skill and careful preparation.
lead_paragraph: Testifying in a Manhattan court, Marko Markovich talked about the night that he and two others sneaked into 1 World Trade Center, climbed to the skyline’s highest point and took flight.

headline.main: On Stand, World Trade Center Parachutist Stresses His Skill
headline.print_headline: Trade Center Parachutist, on Stand, Stresses His Skill
